headline.main: How to Act When Stopped by Police? Illinois Has Some Tips
headline.print_headline: How to Act When Stopped by Police? Illinois Has Some Tips

lead_paragraph: Lawmakers in several states want to require driver's education courses to teach motorists about proper traffic-stop behavior. Most bills don't legislate what that behavior should be, but Illinois' 2017 "Rules of the Road" handbook published last month offers some do's and don'ts:
